alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Caldwell; De Witt; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 12:47AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Caldwell, DeWitt, Guadalupe, Karnes, Gonzales, Atascosa, southwestern Fayette, northwestern Lavaca and Wilson Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1247 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Marcos to near Stockdale to 7 miles southeast of Pleasanton to near Charlotte. Movement was east at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Seguin, Pleasanton, Cuero, Gonzales, Floresville, Yoakum, Luling, Jourdanton, Poteet, Kenedy, Karnes City, Poth, Yorktown, Shiner, Charlotte, Stockdale, Flatonia, Moulton and Christine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Atascosa; Caldwell; De Witt; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson
